name: Mary E. Prados, CPA. PA. Reviews

review.title: “great experience”
review.pros: Pros – Everyone was friendly and nice.Health insurance provided. The atmosphere is wonderful is located in a house, but inside the house has been renovated with new windoxws and wooden floors.
review.cons: Cons – It is a small organization so room for promotion is scarce. The senir level people have been working there for years, so you would have to wait a long time before receiving a promotion.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I would ask the leadership to be more open minded to different types of personalities and people. The Company could be more successful if it was warm and welcoming to all types of consumers
